author: Bhuma Inc.
description: StepZen GraphQL API running on top of Ahana.io - PrestoDB. Presto is an open source SQL query engine that's fast, reliable, and efficient at scale.
name: stepzen-prestodb

scripts.start:cloud: cd ./stepzen && stepzen login --account yuzhne --adminkey ${STEPZEN_ADMIN_KEY} && stepzen start --dashboard=local
